page.title: 10ARTS AND CRAFTS -NORTHWOLD
page.content: Northwold has its own art and craft shop in the High Street.The owner is an artist - his paintings depict many of the village buildings and landmarks,and also local countryside scenes.He also makes toys and puppets. There is also a coppersmith and wrought iron worker living here.He is responsible for many of the beautifully worked wrought iron wind vanes and gates that can be seen in the village. Other artistic hobbies include woodcarving,chinese brushwork,water colour painting,oil painting,general woodwork including furniture making, needlecraft,tapestry,knitting,crochet, heraldry,music and restoring antique furniture.
